Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Heart Disorder/Arrhythmia/Supraventricular Arrhythmia/Wandering Atrial Pacemaker
Record.Description: A condition characterized by the site of origin of impulses, controlling the heart rate, changing within the atria, including the sinus node. Variations within P waves and PR intervals occur and an irregular rate of impulse formation is observed.
